basic_info.name: Maruti Suzuki Victoris
basic_info.description: Maruti Suzuki Victoris is a 5-seater SUV available at a starting price of Rs. 10.5 Lakh. The car is available in 35 variants, with 2 engine and 3 transmission option. Additionally, Victoris offers a Ground Clearance measurement of 210 mm and a Boot capacity of 373 liters. You can choose from 10 colors for the Victoris. The mileage of the Victoris varies from 21.2 KM/L depending on the model.

Exterior: In terms of exterior appearance, the Victoris gets a new face in line with Maruti's new design language. It comprises of a new grille, LED DRLs, and headlamps. Then, at the back, there's a connected LED tail light bar, shark-fin antenna, and a powered tailgate with gesture control. The SUV gets white front and rear skid plates, squared-off wheel arches, and rides on 17-inch (215/60 section) dual-tone aero-cut alloys.
Interior: Inside, the Victoris is replete with new-age features including a 10.25-inch fully digital infotainment screen, 10.1-inch instrument cluster, 64-colour ambient lighting, and an Alexa assistant. Moreover, it gets Suzuki Maps with traffic and speed recognition, Infinity x Dolby Atmos audio with eight speakers, eight-way power-adjustable ventilated front seats, and a panoramic sunroof. There are two new interior colourways and soem variants can be had with an underbody CNG tank with a ‘concealed space’ concept.
Engine and Gearbox: In terms of engine options, Maruti Suzuki has powered the Victoris by a 1.5-litre petrol engine, alogn with mild- and strong-hybrid powertrains. The mid-size SUV is offered in eight variants across FWD and 4WD configurations – LXi, VXi, ZXi, ZXi (O), ZXi+, ZXi+ (O), ZXi+ 4WD, and ZXi+(O) 4WD. On the transmission front, options include a five-speed manual, six-speed automatic with paddle shifters, and an eCVT (strong hybrid). What's more, there are four terrain and three driving modes on offer as well.

verdict: The Victoris, Maruti Arena's flagship SUV, combines a modern design with the proportions of a mid-size SUV. Loaded with several premium features like the latest Dolby Atmos technology and an Infinity Harman sound system, it offers buyers a range of choices across different price points with options like AWD on select variants and a CNG variant.
